info.author: Marcus Fredriksson
info.description:
django-gravatar-tags
====================

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/DrMegahertz/django-gravatar-tags.svg
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/DrMegahertz/django-gravatar-tags

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/django-gravatar-tags.svg
    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-gravatar-tags

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-gravatar-tags.svg
    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-gravatar-tags

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Python%203-Supported-brightgreen.svg

Easy to use template tags for `Gravatar`_ support in `Django`_.


Installation
------------

django-gravatar-tags is available on `PyPI`_. Execute the following command in your
terminal to install the package::

    pip install django-gravatar-tags


Usage
-----

Add ``django_gravatar_tags`` to your ``INSTALLED_APPS``::

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...,
        django_gravatar_tags
    )

Then load the ``gravatar`` library in your templates before using any of the
``gravatar`` or ``gravatar_url`` tags.

::

    {% load gravatar %}

    {# Returns a gravatar img-element for the given email address #}
    {% gravatar <email-address> [size] [rating] [default] [force_default] [css_class] [alt] %}

    {# Returns the gravatar url for a given email address #}
    {% gravatar_url <email-address> [size] [rating] [default] [force_default] %}



Python/Django Compatibility
---------------------------

django-gravatar-tags is tested and supported on the following Python and Django versions:

 - **Python 2.6**: Django 1.4, 1.5, 1.6
 - **Python 2.7**: Django 1.4, 1.5, 1.6, 1.7
 - **Python 3.2, 3.3, 3.4**: Django 1.5, 1.6, 1.7


.. _Gravatar: http://gravatar.com/
.. _Django: http://djangoproject.com/
.. _PyPI: http://pypi.python.org/
info.name: django-gravatar-tags
info.summary: Easy to use Gravatar template tags for Django
